B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan


Personalizing Store
Personalize Pages

1 min
purpose once you add store, the system will automatically take the same logo for the login page for further personalization of the login, registration and reset password pages , admin can add custom text, change the background color, add an image or a flash video in the background , and more this can be done through the pages personalization widget from the admin >> store management >> stores >> select store >> actions drop down >> configuration
